All.name: ICC
All.description:
This project is my graduation project that helps people to know more about the inner components of the computer like ram and processor and know how it looks like, its value and its job by giving the user an interactive 3d object and some information about it.

You can also download an offline version of it.

All.name: Genuine
All.description: Genuine is an Ecommerce website you can see the products or search for specific one and buy it by using PayPal, this website has a dashboard that enabled the owner to add and update and remove the products and also enabling him to know who bought and what he bought.

All.name: Habshtakanat
All.description:
This is a blog website.

In this blog website you can do a lot of things:

  • post an article or edit it or delete it
  • follow some one
  • like an article
  • comment on an article
  • search for some one
  • reset your password if you forget it
  • edit your info
  • you also get some notifications

All.name: Elite Chat
All.description:
robot chat with sound

  • elite can tell you his name and his age
  • elite can tell you some jokes
  • elite can tell you the time and the date
  • elite can answer 'Yes or No' questions
  • elite can tell you some other stuff

All.name: Techno Egaby
All.description: Techno Egaby is an initiative from the Department of Education Technology, Faculty of Specific Education, Fayoum University, to employ tools and content of e-learning to serve the community to raise awareness against the Corona virus.
